statements: UPDATE FraudActivities SET suspicious_activity = true WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE FraudActivities SET transaction_amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE FraudActivities SET transaction_type = 'Fraudulent', suspicious_activity = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 1001
UPDATE FraudActivities SET transaction_date = '2022-10-31', transaction_amount = 250.75 WHERE user_id = 500
UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET location = 'New York' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE suspicious_activity SET activity_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 67890;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE alerts SET alert_date = '2022-01-01 09:00:00' WHERE alert_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 50.20, owner_name = 'John Doe' WHERE account_id = 5678;
UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET is_fraudulent = true WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_profile SET phone_number = '+1-555-123-4567' WHERE customer_id = 789;
UPDATE fraudulent_transactions SET is_fraudulent = true WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date > '2021-10-01';
UPDATE customer_profile SET address = '123 Main Street', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 5;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.00, is_fraudulent = false WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', registration_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = 67890;
UPDATE transactions SET is_fraudulent = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 54321;
